title: You're welcome Riot
body:
Today when I exited my fifth match of the day I was greeted with an amazing message.

**" You have been leaving fewer games recently and your account status has been improved. 
Thanks for putting the effort towards becoming a better player."**

You know, I'm just some random summoner out of millions, nothing special about me here and my low rank. But the message really brightened up my day just because of the acknowledgement of my successes. This is especially true when I just lost a ranked game duo to the usual afk support at 4 minutes and the inting top / adc duo. It just isn't fun getting 29 kills and solo'ing baron 6 times and then losing after 50 minutes of highly invested time. 

So, I just want to say **you're welcome Riot, you're very welcome!**

{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
